name: Tiny RPG (Stephens Clan Gaming)
description:
I created this game with Phaser 3 after playing the demo here. I replaced the map with one my brother made, added a boss (a mole my brother edited), and turned out this!

Collect 50 coins and kill the boss to unlock the door and escape!

Controls:

MoveArrow KeysShootHold Space Bar to pull back bow. Release Space Bar to fire.
